description: Trystan hired his friend Marcus Mojo to clean his pool this last weekend, but there was a bit of a mishap. Trystan forgot to withdraw cash from his bank to pay Mr. Mojo, so he had to get a bit creative in the way he compensated his friend for the work that he did.How's a stick cock in the ass work? We're sure you'd enjoy it, and by the looks of it Marcus sure does too!So if you didn't figure it out, Marcus sucks, and then gets fucked by the Bull in this weeks' amazingly hot update.Enjoy!
title: The Pool Guy
